channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nike’s Jordan brand chairman hid his criminal past for 40 years. Now he wants CHROs to consider second chances
item.description: At age 16, Larry Miller was sent to a juvenile correction center for gang violence. He spent the next four decades concealing that secret.

item.title: Former U.K. prime minister Theresa May on how declining trust is tied to economic malaise: ‘You have to be able to give young people hope for the future’
item.description: Democracy "depends on people having different views, but being able to respect that other people can have different views," May said at the Fortune MP...

item.title: Deportees Went Where?
item.description: We examine the government’s deportation policies.

item.title: Universal’s $7 billion Epic Universe theme park opens today. Here’s what to expect—and the best rides for families and daredevils
item.description: Park is likely to be one of the biggest pop culture events of the year.

item.title: Epic Universe, Florida’s newest major theme park in nearly three decades, is finally open—and Comcast executives are already thinking about expansion
item.description: Park is a big step up from its existing central-Florida projects.

item.title: 21 Nonfiction Books Coming this Summer
item.description: How did streetwear become high fashion? Why are there so many serial killers in the Pacific Northwest? Prize-winning writers tackle these questions, w...

item.title: Tesla brand damage revealed: Consumers rank its ethics and character near the very bottom of new Axios Harris poll
item.description: Even scandal-hit UnitedHealth Group and the UK oil company behind the Deepwater Horizon catastrophe are viewed in a better light.

item.title: Israelis, Stunned by Embassy Shooting, Fear Backlash Over Gaza War
item.description: Political leaders pointed fingers at each other, suggesting that their opponents were responsible for a rise in antisemitism and criticism of Israel.

item.title: Kim Jong-un Vents Fury After Botched Launch of North Korean Destroyer
item.description: He vows to punish as criminals those responsible for the failure, in which the ship had its hull torn open and ended up on its side in the water.
